page6.title: The Scratch Patch at the Rockshop
page6.description: At The Rockshop at Hartbeespoort, our tumble stone scratch patch is a magical adventure for kids. With four cup sizes to choose from, little treasure hunters can dig through a rainbow of polished stones, filling their cups with their favourite finds. Each unique tumble stone becomes a keepsake of wonder and curiosity. Once filled, their special collection is carefully packed into a beautiful organza drawstring bag to take home — a pouch of memories, mystery, and sparkling dreams. It’s more than just stones; it’s the joy of discovery, learning, and creating lasting moments

items.title: Bracelets
items.subtitle: We stock a wide range of bracelets in gemstones and stainless steel. As well as necklaces in stone and sterling silver set with stones. Our range changes often

items.title: Pearls
items.subtitle: Freshwater pearls in strings and jewellery, Pearl earrings and pearls in sterling silver. Single pearl earring pairs and pearls in adjustable rings

items.title: Gemstone Chips
items.subtitle: The biggest range of gemstone and gemstone chip strings immediately available at our store at Hartbeespoort. Take a beautiful drive to us

items.title: Jewellery
items.subtitle: Stunning range of genuine silver jewellery with unique gemstones. We have pendants, earrings and necklaces in stainless steel and 925 silver.

items.title: Rocks
items.subtitle: Rough rocks, crystals and gemstones from all over Africa. Smoky quartz, Citrine and amethyst

items.title: Gifts
items.subtitle: Spheres, pillars, rose quartz lamps and doorknobs, waterbottles with gemstones and many more items made with gemstones in our store

page8.title: Hartbeespoort Dam
page8.description: Hartbeespoort is a popular tourist spot just outside Johannesburg, known for its scenic dam, mountains, and weekend getaways. A visit to The Rockshop at Harties is a must—browse beautiful crystals, fossils, and silver jewellery, enjoy great coffee on the deck, and let the kids play in the Scratch Patch.

page9.title: Visit Our Store
page9.description: Come experience our collection in person
